ActImmigration and Refugee Protection Act
PrecisReappointment of MICHAEL SCOTT McCAFFREY of Toronto, Ontario, as a full-time member of the Immigration and Refugee Board of Canada (Toronto Regional Office), to hold office during good behaviour for a term of three years, effective May 25, 2012.
